fsdict::PatternWeights::PatternType

fsdict::PatternWeights::PatternType Class Reference

a PatternType describes the relation of the lengths of both pattern sides. More...

Public Member Functions

 PatternType (size_t l, size_t r)

Detailed Description

a PatternType describes the relation of the lengths of both pattern sides.

E.g.: the pattern t->th would have the type 1:2

Those types are used to specify standard weights for certain pattern types
